Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Evans
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Evans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, King Drive, 76th, Cottage Grove and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Evans.

Allow extra travel time.
